Title: CS447. Interaction Design Project
Body: Interaction Design Project (same as ME 293) Stanford University 95-96 (may not be offered other years) Instructors: Ellen Tauber, Interval Research Corporation Terry Winograd, Computer Science David Kelley, Product Design/Mechanical Engineering Time Schedule Information: CS447A/ME293A, Winter 1996 1 unit, Thursday 4:15-5:45 PM, History, room 217 CS447B/ME293B, Spring 1996 5 units, time and place to be announced Course Description: Students work in small, interdisciplinary project teams to develop innovative technology prototypes to be submitted to an international student design event sponsored by Interval Research Corporation.
